# NSButton.BezelStyle.toolbar

**Case**

A button style that’s appropriate for a toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
case toolbar
```

## Discussion

Use this case for displaying a button in an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar].



For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Toolbar

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBar**: A button style that’s typically used in the context of an accessory toolbar for buttons that narrow the focus of a search or other operation.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBarAction**: A button style that you use for extra actions in an accessory toolbar.
